item.title: [317] ~Delta~ Adding the ::item command ~Delta~ [317]
item.dc:creator: @I_Roll_Deep I Roll Deep
item.description:
@I_Roll_Deep wrote:

Hello guys, Ive seen many 317s without the ::item command. They mostly had the ::pickup, or ::spawn command.
This is way better, its spawning system like for 508s.

Here.

if (command.startsWith("item") && (playerRights >= 2)) { String[] args = command.split(" "); if (args.length == 3) { int chi = Integer.parseInt(args[1]); int kitory = Integer.parseInt(args[2]); for(int i = chi; i <= kitory; i++) { addItem(i, 1); } } }
At the moment it`s only Administrator+ free spawn.
If you wanna make free spawn for all players change the :

&& (playerRights >= 2)) {
to
&& (playerRights >= 0)) {
If you wish it to be mod+, change it to :
&& (playerRights >= 1)) {
If you wish it to be Owner/co owner + change it to :
&& (playerRights >= 3)) {

Reply if you got any problem.

Please, change the section if i posted in the wronge one! thanks

Read full topic
